column5: Anyone fished the Beaver in last few days, at Thornbury or headwaters? Heading that way Monday AM.
Have a great time... let us know how it goes!

hi there, they are floating pink 3-4" worms as well as natural colour rubber worms right at the dam and down to the mouth. things are still good in the rivers around here. even the pretty is doing well at nottawa. where abouts are u from donf?? hope thats helpful.
Whitby - too far from my favorite streams - the Beaver and upper Saugeen,
beaver has been good both lower and upper!   Little black wooly buggers and klinkhammers have been the ticket for steelies and browns respectively!
Little late for you but Sunday the lower was high and fast but receeding and a bit murky.  The upper was moving nicely but still a lot of water moving through there.  jjcanoe
Got a couple of nice rainbows om Monday May 5. My brother has been up there all week and getting 1 or 2 each day.
